titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on fomesafen.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/16/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on (5-(2-chloro-4 (trifluoromethyl) phenoxy)-n-(methylsulfonyl)-2-nitrobenzamide (fomesafen).
